content.question: Asian reactions to Western claims of racial and cultural superiority, such as the reaction by Shigenobu in the passage, were also instrumental in the period 1918â€“1945 in the

choices.label: intensification of anti-imperial resistance activities and independence movements
growing number of conversions to Christianity among Asian peoples
growing popularity of laissez-faire economic policies in Asian states
establishment of European immigrant enclaves in many parts of South and East Asia

content.answer: intensification of anti-imperial resistance activities and independence movements

topic.text: 7.5: Unresolved Tensions after World War I

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
